name: Sunwave Hotel
description:
Do you like pina coladas? Want to escape to a sunny beach getaway packed with hot alien babes? Sunwave Hotel is an erotic visual novel with point-and-click adventure elements that blends science-fiction fantasy with high-octane thrills and sexual escapades!

Following a heist gone wrong, you and your partner-in-crime have crash landed on a tropical paradise. However this is no time for a vacation- your employer is a ruthless criminal overlord and expects results. You must find a way to get back on your feet and carry out your original job or face the consequences.



Chart your course across a chain of exotic islands- making new friends and contending with new dangers along the way.

  • CHOOSE YOUR PATH - With multiple routes across the islands, you have many options.
  • BLOW OFF STEAM - Dozens of sex scenes, beautifully rendered with hand-drawn artwork.
  • MAKE IT COUNT - Do you complete your original mission, or join up with your new friends?
